title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Sightseeing - Flying in a thunderstorm
description:
Probably not the most smart thing to do in real life but he this is a simulator: flying in a thunderstorm. I am flying near the Etna volcano which is located at Sicily in a Miller JM-2 created by Aerosoar.

If you also would like to try the aircraft download it from the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/8174/miller-jm-2
